Text:
Hi BON-DUQA,
I have downloaded a lot of your Uploads & this is only the second failure so I am not complaining.

It wouldn't play with VLC or WMP so I tried converting it with AVS & DIVX but they had issues with it. I then converted it with Sound Taxi & used the highest quality selection, it plays now but the Sync is way out & it lost quality & turns to pixels when viewing.

Thank you very much for a lot of other good movies.

Cheers
